message.body: Hey sorry I haven't gotten back to you. My phone has such awful signal where I live
oh its OK. u gotta smart phone?
Yeah I have an iPhone
Wanna see one of my videos?
Yeah side!
Sure*
Nice job, are you Final Cut Pro certified?
Lol no total amateur. Would u like to see my latest..its a rap vid
Absolutely!
I'm in this one
That was even better
Thanks. U should like our band page if Ur on Facebook lol
Def tryna get way better tho!!
Need special effects
What kind of effects??
I dunno. Superpowers lol
Demonic powers. All sorts of stuff
I really dunno how to use ae or motion at all
Ok! I'll see what I can figure out! :)
do u have ae?
Motion is another cool program. A lot of complicated things you can Dobson ae are WAY easier to do in motion
U gotta show me! Haha
I should make tutorial videos for you! Haha
Actually, a lot of what I've learned we're trough tutorial videos on YouTube and such. You should look up free tutorials on creativecow.net
Yeah I need hands on learning. U dun wanna teach me? Lol
Yeah I wouldn't mind showing you what I know. Do you have any experiences in either program?
No very limited. I am pretty good with fcpx. And I'm not totally unfamiliar with the interfaces. I understand how they basically work but not well at all
Oh ok. I'm better with motion graphics than I am with special effects. But I'll see what I can do and I'll show you
Yeah that would be awesome.
This guy I'm making a video for said he wants to go around the city as if he's hunting in the wild. Gotta figure how to make that work
I'll mess around with effects later to see what I can come up with for your video!
Awesome
